summary: Now you can take out your frustrations on a Trollface target dummy!
descriptionHtml:
>> Target Dummy: Trollface by cicatrice

   This mod replaces the texture of a target dummy (there are three types, only one will change) with one that has a trollface. Do enjoy practicing your weapons and abilities on the troll!

>> Install

   Use an unzipping program (e.g. 7zip, WinRar) to extract the files/folders into your Skyrim install directory.

   * For Steam users: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

>> Uninstall

   Remove the following files:

   * Data\\textures\\clutter\\practiceTdummy1.dds
   * Data\\meshes\\clutter\\practicedummy\\practicedummy01.nif
author: cicatrice
